tiled.mapeditor.actions
Class AbstractLayerAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      tiled.mapeditor.actions.AbstractLayerAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddLayerAction, AddObjectGroupAction, CloneLayerAction, DeleteLayerAction, MergeAllLayersAction, MergeLayerDownAction, MoveLayerDownAction, MoveLayerUpAction
public abstract class AbstractLayerAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

Provides a common abstract class for actions that modify the layer configuration. It makes sure the undo/redo information is properly maintained. todo: These actions will need to listen to changing of the current selected todo: layer index as well as changes to the opened map. Action should always todo: be disabled when no map is opened. More specific checks should be todo: included in subclasses.

Version:
$Id$
See Also:
